name: Darren JOHNSON, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Johnson v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Darren JOHNSON, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of November, 2013, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and the Application for Immediate Hearing are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
80 A.3d 378
Darren JOHNSON, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 145 EM 2013.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 20, 2013.
